structure.unit: Inspection And Sale Of Food, Drugs And Various Articles

law.catch_line: Scales For Vehicles Used For Retail Delivery; List Of Current Prices
law.text: A dealer in ice, who refuses or neglects to provide scales for each vehicle used by him for the retail delivery of ice, or who neglects to furnish to the sealer of weights and measures of each city or town in which he conducts business a list of the current prices of ice sold by him at retail, shall be punished by a fine of not more than fifty dollars.
